name: Krios, Etherym of Illusion
text:
2 Level 4 "Etherym" monsters
You can target 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters, attach it to this card as Xyz Material. You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from this card; Special Summon 1 of your banished Sea Serpent monsters. You can banish 1 monster from your GY (Quick Effect); banish this card until the next End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Krios, Etherym of Illusion" once per turn.
